rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0001
rows.name: Something the matter, Menou?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0002
rows.name: Menou, everything okay?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0003
rows.name: Menou? Is something troubling you?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0004
rows.name: What's bothering you, Menou?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0005
rows.name: Take a look at this.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0006
rows.name:
...Have you thought about
what these ruins' walls and floors
might be made of?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0007
rows.name: Regular rocks, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0008
rows.name:
I initially thought they were
just quarried stones
put together too, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0009
rows.name:
With natural materials, processed and
put together, you'd expect some flaws,
some deformations somewhere...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0010
rows.name:
And with this ruin shooting up into the
sky like this...even small variations at
ground level would cause it to tilt over.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0011
rows.name:
So how do you think
they actually built this place?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0012
rows.name:
Then how do you figure
they constructed these ruins?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0013
rows.name:
So what's your explanation for
how these ruins came to be?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0014
rows.name:
So how'd they manage
to build something like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0015
rows.name:
Well, the treated blocks were stacked
up into the sky, with perfect accuracy
and no errors. That much is true.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0016
rows.name:
And the durability
is just extraordinary.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0017
rows.name:
Over hundreds, thousands, or tens of
thousands of years, the walls and
floors didn't break or become brittle.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0019
rows.name: The ancients were truly incredible!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0020
rows.name:
We couldn't possibly achieve
this with our current technology.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0021
rows.name:
I can only imagine what incredible
minerals and materials they must have
used to construct this place...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0022
rows.name:
The World Tree is just
one mystery after another...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0023
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0024
rows.name:
You seem super enthusiastic
about all this.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0025
rows.name:
Doesn't seem to be
any bugs around here.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0026
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0027
rows.name:
You're quite pumped about this,
aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0028
rows.name: This place is bug-free, I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0029
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0030
rows.name:
You appear quite exhilarated
at the moment.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0031
rows.name: Appears to be a bug-free environment.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0032
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0033
rows.name:
You're super excited right now,
aren't ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0034
rows.name: Not a bug in sight 'round here...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0101
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0102
rows.name:
I'm curious about the construction,
of course, but more than that, I love
the adventure of it!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0103
rows.name:
Just imagining the thoughts of the
ancient people who built this place...
doesn't that make your heart race?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0104
rows.name:
And these symbols I can't read... Are
they knowledge? Are they a warning?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0105
rows.name:
All these artifacts crafted from
materials completely foreign to us...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0106
rows.name:
Simply standing here
makes my heart race with excitement...!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0107
rows.name: I totally get it!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0108
rows.name:
Yeah,
I can relate to that feeling.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0109
rows.name:
Heh...
I suppose I can appreciate
that sentiment.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0110
rows.name:
Too right,
I totally understand.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0111
rows.name:
Building something this enormous
must have required countless workers
toiling together...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0112
rows.name:
Just constructing these floors
and walls must have taken
an unbelievable amount of time...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0113
rows.name:
Every hope and dream of countless
individuals has been carefully
enshrined in these walls.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0114
rows.name:
This place is essentially a monument
to the vision of ancient peoples.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0115
rows.name:
So this place is the crystallization
of ancient people's thoughts?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0116
rows.name:
I see, so this place is the
crystallization of ancient people's
thoughts.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0117
rows.name:
So this place is the crystallization
of ancient people's thoughts, eh.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0118
rows.name:
Well, that's quite
the poetic perspective.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0119
rows.name:
Indeed, you'd never find such an
incredible monument anywhere else in
Alst, no matter how hard you searched.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0120
rows.name:
Let's search every inch of these ruins
and absorb all the wisdom and passion
that the ancients left behind!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0201
rows.name:
Hold on!
Why do you sound
disappointed about that!?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0202
rows.name:
I was just relieved that the
World Tree's interior doesn't seem like
the place where bugs would thrive!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0203
rows.name:
With a name like "World Tree,"
I was bracing myself for a bug-infested
nightmare, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0204
rows.name:
So that's why you were
exploring in good spirits.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0205
rows.name:
So that's why you were exploring
in such a good mood.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0206
rows.name:
So that's why you were
exploring in high spirits.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0207
rows.name:
That's why you were buzzing with
excitement during the exploration, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0208
rows.name: Exactly!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0209
rows.name:
I love minerals,
but inversely proportional
to that, I hate bugs.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0210
rows.name:
The more I come to like minerals,
the more I come to hate bugs.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0211
rows.name:
You really hate bugs, huh.
I wonder what would happen
if Menou went into the Cloud Sea...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0212
rows.name: That makes absolutely no sense.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0213
rows.name:
What a peculiar correlation
you've developed there.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0214
rows.name: How does that make any sense...

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0215
rows.name: Masterpon, I've returned!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0216
rows.name:
Hana, good timing!
Masterpon's tummy making hungry noises!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0217
rows.name: Hana bring backntop-quality ingredients!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0218
rows.name:
What kind of ingredients could
possibly be found here?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0219
rows.name: What did you manage to find?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0220
rows.name:
What'd you collect?
I'm hungry too, you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0221
rows.name: What kind of ingredients did you find?

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0222
rows.name:
What'd you bring back?
Share some with me!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0223
rows.name:
Jabara bugs!
Very tasty when fried!

rows.label: kizunatalk081_msg0224
rows.name: Kyaaaaaaa!!
